mdProblem.name: dss.vector.solutions.entomology.InvalidFemaleQuantityProblem
mdProblem.label: Invalid Female Quantity
mdProblem.description: The number of female is greater than the total number of mosquitos

mdProblem.name: dss.vector.solutions.entomology.InvalidMaleQuantityProblem
mdProblem.label: Invalid Male Quantity
mdProblem.description: The number of male is greater than the total number of mosquitos

mdProblem.name: dss.vector.solutions.entomology.QuantityMismatchProblem
mdProblem.label: Quantity Mismatch Problem
mdProblem.description: The number of total number of mosquitos does not equal the number of male and number of female

mdProblem.name: dss.vector.solutions.entomology.InvalidMorphologicalQuantityProblem
mdProblem.label: Invalid Quantity
mdProblem.description: A MorphologicalSpecieGroup has a contextually invalid quantity (Equal to or less than 0)

mdProblem.name: dss.vector.solutions.entomology.EmptyValueProblem
mdProblem.label: Empty Value Problem
mdProblem.description: A MorphologicalSpecieGroup is missing contextual required values

mdProblem.name: dss.vector.solutions.entomology.InvalidMorphologicalSpecieProblem
mdProblem.label: Invalid Morphological Specie Problem
mdProblem.description: A morphological specie group cannot have an identification method or specie if the quantity is zero
